channel.title: Register.php help
channel.description:
hello guys, i was wondering if anyone would be kind to show me a way to make a Registration for CHARACTERS in rscdv25 [u]without having to use the punbb forums[/u]
I know that every forum account share banks with all accounts under the same USER ID, so i believe i need to make it have a different USER ID.. I dont know, what do you think?

item.title: Register.php help
item.dc:creator: @Miles1 Miles`
item.description:
@Miles1 wrote:

There’s a RSCD DL link with no forums, let me find it real quick.

  • http://www.4shared.com/file/99751475/8e56ceb4/RSCD_Noforums.html

Read full topic
